summary: Karachi is Pakistan's biggest city and a global hub. With over 20 million people, it's one of the world's largest cities. Located by the Arabian Sea, it was once Pakistan's capital. Karachi is a diverse city with many languages and cultures. It has a rich history, dating back thousands of years, and grew significantly with the British arrival in the 1800s. Today, it's Pakistan's main economic center, with many industries and businesses. The city is also known for its fashion and busy ports. Despite past challenges with crime, Karachi is becoming safer.
title: Karachi
